898710.name: Shadowlings - Official Soundtrack
898710.description:
Official soundtrack by Arthur Brukh and Philip Podolny

Some tracks available on Soundcloud (check external links)

Track list:

1. Main Menu Theme
2. The Help of Liokama
3. The Shadow Of Defeat Pt.1
4. The Shadow Of Defeat Pt.2
5. The Shadow Of Defeat (midi)
6. The World Of The Past
7. Ghost Temple
8. Kamikaze
9. From The Cradle To The Blade
10. Duty To Die
11. Road Into The Beyond
12. Alone In The Shadow Pt.1
13. Alone In The Shadow
14. Beginning Of The End
15. Boiling Point
16. Death At The End Of The Tunnel
17. Closing Credits Theme
18. Hide-n-seek bonus track (midi)
